keyword: calories in m and m peanuts
title: Calories in M&M Peanuts
meta_description: Discover calories in m and m peanuts per 100 g, including full nutrition breakdown with carbs, fats, protein, and serving tips for better tracking.
assumptions: Standard Peanut M&M's: dry-roasted peanuts coated in milk chocolate; no additional toppings or modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, batch, exact ingredients, and portion size. Always check product labels for precise information.

quick_answer.text: 100 g of M&M peanuts packs ~497 kcal, mostly from fats and sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Dark chocolate coating instead of milk

faqs.q: How many calories in m and m peanuts per serving?
faqs.a: A typical 30 g serving has about 149 kcal.

faqs.q: What are the macros for M&M peanuts?
faqs.a: Per 100 g: 30 g fat, 47 g carbs (44 g sugars), 13 g protein.

faqs.q: Are M&M peanuts high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, about 44 g sugars per 100 g, mostly from the chocolate coating.

faqs.q: How much protein in M&M peanuts?
faqs.a: Around 13 g per 100 g, primarily from the peanuts.

faqs.q: Do M&M peanuts have trans fats?
faqs.a: Typically 0 g trans fat per 100 g in standard varieties.
